00028 #define FOREACH_SERIE(index, dataset) \
00029         for (int index = 0; index < dataset->GetSerieCount(); index++)
00030 
00031 #define FOREACH_DATAITEM(index, serie, dataset) \
00032         for (int index = 0; index < dataset->GetCount(serie); index++)
